Reference

All functions

BulkSignalR

BulkSignalR: A package to infer ligand-receptor interactions from bulk transcriptomics or proteomics

checkReceptorSignaling()

Check receptor signaling downstream

.buildPermutatedCountMatrix()

Internal function to generate a randomized expression matrix

.buildPermutationIndices()

Internal function to generate expression matrix permutation indices

.cutExtremeValues()

Internal function to cut extreme values from a matrix

.downstreamSignaling()

Function to check receptor signaling downstream

.edgesLRIntracell()

Internal function to generate a ligand-receptor-downstream signaling network

.getGammaParam()

Internal function to fit a Gamma distribution

.getGaussianParam()

Internal function to fit a Gaussian distribution

.shufflePermutationIndices()

Internal function to shuffle permutation indices

dualHeatmap()

Heatmap function for LR scores and additional data

getCorrelatedLR()

Get correlated ligand-receptor pairs.

getEmpiricalNull()

Internal function sampling the (empirical) null distribution downstream the receptors

getEmpiricalNullCorrLR()

Internal function sampling of the (empirical) null distribution of ligand-receptor correlations

getLRGeneSignatures()

Extract gene signatures of LR pair activity

getLRIntracellNetwork()

Generate a ligand-receptor-downstream signaling network

getLRNetwork()

Generate a ligand-receptor network

getMultipleLRIntracellNetworks()

Generate multiple ligand-receptor-downstrem signaling networks

getMultipleLRNetworks()

Generate multiple ligand-receptor networks

getPathwayStats()

Statistics related to pathways

learnParameters()

Training of BulkSignalR model parameters

pValuesLR()

Ligand-receptor pair P-value estimation

prepareDataset()

Prepare a BulkSignalR data set

reduceToBestPathway()

Keep one pathway per ligand-receptor pair

reduceToLigand()

Aggregate the receptors of a same ligand

reduceToPathway()

Aggregate ligands and receptors at the pathway level

reduceToReceptor()

Aggregate the ligands of a same receptor

scoreLRGeneSignatures()

Score ligand-receptor gene signatures

scoreSignatures()

Gene signature scoring

sdc

Salivary duct carcinoma transcriptomes

simpleHeatmap()

Heatmap function for LR scores

tme.signatures

Tumor microenvironment gene signatures
